Title: Beat the battledrum, in 1960 we will continue the Great Leap Forward!
Designer: Ha Qiongwen (哈琼文)Weng Yizhi (翁逸之)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This poster has been cut in eight and recycled for printing texts. The printed text shimmers through the very thin paper.
